numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice a claim about poorer countries.
2. In poorer countries, people say that the world is getting better every generation.
3. I notice a claim about wealthier countries.
6. The U.S. is a wealthier country.
7. The U.K. is a wealthier country.
8. In these wealthier countries, less than 75% of 15-to-24-year-olds say that the world is getting better.
9. I wonder about a possible reason for this difference.
10. More technology is developed in wealthier countries.
11. I wonder whether this technology makes life less enjoyable.
12. I also wonder why Indonesia has such a percentage.
13. This comment relates to my community.
14. I live in one of the countries on the chart.
15. The title is: World Question: Is the World Getting Better, Or Worse.
